resources.string: Healthy sleep solution
BrightEyes
Connect with your BrightEyes
2. Make sure your device is powered on
Put the power wire in the power socket. You will see the time on your screen.
3. Is the device in setup-mode?

1) Press the Home button
 2) Press the Gear button
 3) Long press the Wi-Fi button
 Is the Wi-Fi light blinking?
Yes, Wi-Fi is blinking
No, Wi-Fi is not blinking
Has your %1$s left setup?
Is the Wi-Fi light on your %1$s still blinking?
Enable the setup mode on the %1$s
Follow the steps to enable the setup mode on the %1$s
Try setting up regardless
Usually you can setup device in this state, Please try setting it up. Otherwise, try to enable setup mode again.
Accidently connected with wrong phone?
If your device has been connected to another phone by accident, then you can try to set it up again with the correct phone.
Make sure your device is powered on
Proposition specific instructions to power the device.
